data.text: @HerecomesDrBob .@kylibrarianjen had a great uncle killed out there. We’ve got some of his correspondence
@TravisHardy12 What would you say is least appreciated or known about it? I've never done a deep dive.
@HerecomesDrBob I did a directed research on this in my MA program
@HerecomesDrBob @robgreeneII For Lloyd George and Churchill it wasn’t that complicated. Stupid, doomed to failure, wasteful of lives. Rightly convinced the Soviets the British couldn’t be trusted.
@HerecomesDrBob One of the weirder and more confused interventions in US history.
